name: Xianliang Tung
story: Wei Meng is a former army medic who joined the OPFOR as an ammo bearer after retiring from military service. He is quiet and reserved, preferring to spend his free time meditating and reading ancient texts. Despite his calm demeanor, Wei is fiercely dedicated to his duties and stops at nothing to ensure his fellow soldiers have the ammunition they need to accomplish their missions. Wei is single and has no close family, devoting himself fully to his service to the OPFOR.
